org.apache.flink.api.common.operators.base

Class FileDataSinkBase<IN>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.api.common.operators.Operator<Nothing>
      • org.apache.flink.api.common.operators.GenericDataSinkBase<IN>
        • org.apache.flink.api.common.operators.base.FileDataSinkBase<IN>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Visitable<Operator<?>>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FileDataSink

    public class FileDataSinkBase<IN>
extends GenericDataSinkBase<IN>
    Operator for nodes which act as data sinks, storing the data they receive in a file instead of sending it to another contract. The encoding of the data in the file is handled by the FileOutputFormat.
    See Also:
    FileOutputFormat

      Creates a FileDataSink with the provided FileOutputFormat implementation and the given name, writing to the file indicated by the given path.

        protected final String filePath

    • Constructor Detail

      • FileDataSinkBase

        public FileDataSinkBase(FileOutputFormat<IN> f,
                        UnaryOperatorInformation<IN,Nothing> operatorInfo,
                        String filePath,
                        String name)
        Creates a FileDataSink with the provided FileOutputFormat implementation and the given name, writing to the file indicated by the given path.
        Parameters:
        f - The FileOutputFormat implementation used to encode the data.
        filePath - The path to the file to write the contents to.
        name - The given name for the sink, used in plans, logs and progress messages.

      • FileDataSinkBase

        public FileDataSinkBase(UserCodeWrapper<FileOutputFormat<IN>> f,

        Creates a FileDataSink with the provided FileOutputFormat implementation and the given name, writing to the file indicated by the given path.
        Parameters:
        f - The FileOutputFormat implementation used to encode the data.
        filePath - The path to the file to write the contents to.
        name - The given name for the sink, used in plans, logs and progress messages.
